Geri (she/her)

Geri is an award winning editor steered by a shrewd intuitive touch and perfectionism. Having worked across both commercial and independent film spaces - narrative shorts, documentaries, music videos and fashion films has made her perceptive in the field. Beyond the cutting room floor, Geri channels innate sensitivity and warmth throughout her work. She aims to empower both the narratives and characters she takes on through pace, rhythm and timing of her editing.

Geri’s work has been screened and revelled at Melbourne International Film Festival, Melbourne Queer Film Festival, Melbourne’s Women in Film Festival, Mardi Gras Film Festival, St Kilda Film Festival & The Atom Awards. One of her latest works, Eden Alone Surpasses, won best short film documentary at the Australian International Documentary Conference. While her client list boasts the likes of Apple, Nike, JD Sports, Kathmandu, Champion, Mecca, Mazda, Mercedes Benz &  Melbourne Fashion Week alongside notable Australian music acts Troye Sivan, G-Flip, Mallrat, Lisa Mitchell, Gretta Ray & Alice-Ivy.
